description: This file defines data models for user-related data transfer objects (DTOs) using Pydantic. It includes schemas for user creation, reading, updating, and listing responses, focusing on user attributes such as name, id, and timestamps.

classes.name: UserBase
classes.description: Shared user fields, including display name.

classes.name: UserCreate
classes.description: Payload for creating a new user, inheriting from UserBase.

classes.name: UserUpdate
classes.description: Payload for updating user information, primarily the user name.

classes.name: UserRead
classes.description: Schema representing user data in responses, including ID and timestamps.

classes.name: UserListResponse
classes.description: Envelope for listing multiple users with total count.
